 2020-02072020-03-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC
ActDepartment of Public Works and Government Services Act
SubjectOrder providing goods and services to any private entity in Canada or elsewhere
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Public Works and Government Services to acquire and provide goods and services to any private entity in Canada or elsewhere during the COVID-19 pandemic for the health and safety of Canadians.
